intro: Piptospatha acutifolia, commonly known as the acuteleaf piptospatha, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and is characterized by its lance-shaped leaves and showy, pinkish-white flowers. The plant is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been used in traditional medicine in some African countries.
